Good luck.
[/quote]
Shane when you worked with them you hardly did anything either…[/quote]

item.title: Sacred PK V2 - A new meaning to RsPs [Coming Soon]
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“C++ Imbued, post:186, topic:429928”][quote author=lostmyphat link=topic=532610.msg3892918#msg3892918 date=1327045710]
Holy crap dude! Amazing pi, I have NEVER seen anything like it before!
[/quote]You can download this PI… nothing special was released was called Eyfiascape.[/quote]

yeah but then when you look at the base then if we let you see are base you would be like oh much better because we have done so much updates if you go from like page 3 then scroll down each page you will see are updates but some updates have not been added

this is a latest code tag off are updates [code]~ 1/23/12

  • added loyalty titles were you right click on a player to see the title - liamp
  • added in game highscores- liamp
- Decompiled Signlink.class in client. ~Max
- Added runescape's newest context menu's - Max
- Fixed Deposit Item's so it does NOT lag/freeze you - Max
- Added Random Events Base working on finishing it. - Shane
- Loyalty tags are now added into chatbox. - Max
- Added Server Notice (A message appears as a yell everyone so often) - Max
- Added when a staff member logs in it shows a message (for the lulz). - Shane
~~~~1/25/12
- Fixed skilling teleport and added new teleport (Advanced Skilling) - Max
- AWESOME NEW UPDATE! 100% Regional clipping! - Max
- Clipped firemaking! - Max
- Re-Wrote Thieveing, and firemaking, crafting! - Max
- Added double EXP weekends! - Max
- Added restricted donator zone area! If isDonator = 0 you are teleported out of donar area and if isDonator = 1 you are aloud to stay:) - Max
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/26/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- More stability - Sacred
- Fixed deadlocks - Sacred
- Fixed the pathfinder compiler error thing - Sacred
- Updated Forums/Website - Sacred

~~~1/26/12
- re-wrote the Custom RFD Quest - liamp
- New mini-quest used for construction talk to xarzus at home (It has some bugs I'm fixing) - shane

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/27/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Added portal for RFD quest - Sacred
- Added money pouch (Download these files [http://uppit.com/es9o24isav2c/coinorb.rar] then extract it
  it to 'Sprites' folder in cache :) - Sacred
- added half off zombiecaves finishing tomorrow - liamp


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/28/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Fixed 2 compiler errors (cycleventhandler thing) by someone - Sacred
- Added CycleEvent system - Sacred
- Server is now stable, fixed the massive lagging - Sacred
- Added MySQL.java for future Vote4Cash, Web Hiscores, Auto donation system & ETC
- Fixed 1 Duel Arena dupe =) - Sacred
- Added Face North - Sacred
- new minigame finished zombiecaves kinda like nazi zombies  - liamp
- add the zombiecaves to minigames - liamp
- moved godwars to boss teleport - liamp


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/29/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Made 'Deposit all carried items' & 'Deposit worn items' for only donators' only feature =) - Sacred
- [Perfectionist tweak] Prioritized menu clicking - Sacred
- Server disconnection fixed - Sacred
- Overload server disconnecting fixed - Sacred
- Opening bank anywhere fixed (If someone attempted to, the server will announce like this'[Playername] has attemted to bank hack!') - Sacred
- Stackable equipment dupe fixed - Sacred
- Added Donator Points system - Sacred
- Added Donator Shop (Feel free to add items via ShopAssistant.java) - Sacred
- fix the 3072 error - liamp
- added a cycle event for zombie game so the next waves should start - liamp
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/30/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Added Context Menu Image - Sacred
- Added basic report abuse system - Sacred
- New startup client =) - Sacred & - Joseph
- 699 Special Attack Bar - Sacred
- New Compass Sprite :) - Sacred
- New bank interface - Sacred
- Many many many new interfaces & sprites - Sacred
- Added 'Deposit worn items' (Donators' only feature)
- Fixed 'Deposit carried items lagg' (Donators' only feature)
- made so in nazi zombie minigame you keep items on death - liamp
- added so  that u can't teleport out of the nazi zombie minigame - liamp
- added reward 2.5m + 30pc points as reward - liamp
- added multi zone to nazi zombies so all the zombies spawned will atk you at once -liamp
- added added crates in the area so u wouldnt go to non multi and can glitch the zombies - liamp
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/31/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Added 100% Firemaking - Clipped, Fire's dissappear and turn to ashes. - Max
- New client loading, background + many more - Sacred
- New client LoginBox + Hoverings - Sacred
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~2/02/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- added sea troll - liamp
- added sea troll multi so everyone can atk it at once - liamp
- found + added the coords so you teleport to the sea troll - liamp
- added the zone on boss teleports - liamp
- added sea troll anims a little glitchy - liamp
- added + made so you could attack it and it would attack you back - liamp
- also added boss teleports 2 thats were sea troll is located - liamp
- added it to normal teleports to were apetroll was is boss teleports2 -liamp
- added new boss teleport bork - liamp
- added bork - liamp
- added/found coords to were bork would be - liamp
- added multi so everyone can atk at him once - liamp
- added brok anims - liamp
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~2/03/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- CacheDownloader (Latest Cache Link) - Sacred
- added the new source/client witch has brok added in -liamp
- added easter ring + when you click it it turn you into a egg - liamp
- added an unmorphing option (you click unmorph to stop being an egg) - liamp
- added different colour eggs to so when you click on the ring u wont always be the same colour egg -liamp
- Sucessfully added D-bow troll mini-game (my own) with 4 (HARD) waves. - Shane
- added drop party room ( note there is no chest atm :( sorry the chest wont spawn) -liamp
- added knights dancing on the table in drop party room - liamp
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~2/05/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- GameFrame is now back to normal! - Sacred http://uppit.com/698qs87ei8ap/.SacredPkV1.zip

- tweak the icons around the gameframe and added my cache with the new icons -liamp
[/code]

Read full topic
